{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = High explosive grenade rounds | class = HEGrenadeRounds | game = Strife | doomednum = 152 | convid =177, 170, 174 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→HEGrenadeRounds
A bundle of six high-explosive grenades for Strife's [[Classes:StrifeGrenadeLauncher|grenade launcher]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR HEGrenadeRounds : {{Class|Ammo}} { +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 6 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 30 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackAmount}} 6 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}} 60 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_GRN1" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_HEGRENADES" // "HE-Grenade Rounds" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_HEGRENADES" // "You picked up the HE-Grenade Rounds." States { Spawn: GRN1 A -1 Stop } }
